'''2.1.5908''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), '''2.1.5907''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5906''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is a [[launcher]] beta version released on July 22, 2019, which fixed bugs.<ref name=":1">https://piston-meta.mojang.com/mc/launcher_beta_changelog.md</ref>

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-10463}} - Minecraft freezing on startup
* {{Bug|MCL-10963}} - Application Data directory is not changed with --workDir argument
* {{Bug|MCL-11268}} - Native launcher does not set current working directory correctly when launching the game
* {{Bug|MCL-11315}} - Relative paths in Game Directory are used twice
* {{Bug|MCL-11393}} - On startup, the launcher freezes at around 80-90% and then crashes.
* {{Bug|MCL-11565}} - When I press play the minecraft launcher doesn't load and an error appears: "Game Crashed"
* Fixed a bug that caused the game to start with the wrong arguments on some systems.
* Fixed a bug that caused the game to start with the wrong directory setting when running with a custom directory.
</onlyinclude>
